Pre-Game Insights: The Toronto Blue Jays and the Atlanta Braves meet Saturday in MLB action from Truist Park.
This will be the second installment in a three-game series.
Starting pitcher for the Blue Jays will be Jose Berrios, who is 14-9 with a 3.59 ERA in 28 starts this season.
Starting pitcher for the Braves will be Spencer Schwellenbach, who is 5-6 with a 3.69 ERA in 16 starts this season.
Recent betting trends indicate that each of the Braves' last eight home games after playing the previous day has gone UNDER the total runs line.
Six of the Blue Jays' last seven night games against NL East opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Blue Jays' last five Saturday night games.
